channel.title: Well...Once Small Thing Please
channel.description:
I have searched the entire forums and there isn't a single topic on how to run "MoparScape Private Server Client v2.1"
There is not pinned topic or anything. Don't tell me to wearch becuase I have. I have unzipped the file and Im looking in it and there isn't an exe file that starts the program. I have no clue on how to use this and it would be nice if you would tell the people who have no clue how to run it. And have a pinned topic :|
I would really appriciate some type of tut.

item.title: Well...Once Small Thing Please
item.dc:creator: @philip_l_g philip_l_g
item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

[quote=“doomsday, post:12, topic:3599”]hey, i have a question too, what is once a small favor?

i tried out hundreds of possible meaning for it, the best would be

one small favor

but then again he didnt say that did he?

does he mean, it was a small favor, now its a big one?[/quote]
stop it your confusing me !!

Read full topic
